safetyTips: All deliveries are contact free and we follow strict cleaning procedures in the shop.
name: The Odds
description: Born a vegan restaurant, we evolved during lockdown to become a vegan deli and natural wine shop. We sell a large selection of vegan cheese, natural wine, craft beer, coffee, bread, vegan ice cream and baked goods. We deliver free to our local area for orders over Â£15. Order before 3 pm for same-day delivery. We also offer next day delivery nationwide by courier.
